name: Sky Balloon Freakout
description:
NOTE: I strongly recommend the Windows version.

"Saddle up, airman! We've got a bogey at Angels 40!" -Someone, Somewhere

You are a Spy Balloon floating in enemy airspace. A fighter jet has been scrambled to intercept and shoot you down! Worse, surface-to-air missiles are aiming right at you!! Fly! Fly for as long as possible, and see how long you can stay aloft!!

Controls: 

  • WASD / Arrow
  • Space Bar
  • Escape (Desktop Versions)

Spy Balloon Freakout was heavily inspired by the work of Tony Alden. I spent 2-3 days developing this game, and I'm happy with the quick results! I'm bummed the Linux and HTML5 ports lack the polish of the Windows version, but that's Game Maker these days. *sigh*
